siteInfo.title: Gnomix
siteInfo.description: A collection of open-source projects and tools for customizing your Linux experience.

projects.name: Gnomix Script
projects.description: A powerful customization script that transforms your Ubuntu system into a pure, vanilla desktop environment. Strips away Canonical modifications, Snap packages, and bloatware - giving you your choice of GNOME, KDE Plasma, XFCE, Cinnamon, or MATE.

projects.name: Gnomix OS
projects.description: A stripped-down minimal custom version of Ubuntu, with pure GNOME. Gnomix is a community remix of Ubuntu - not affiliated with or endorsed by Canonical Ltd. Experience Ubuntu the way it was meant to be.

projects.name: Rust ISO
projects.description: A bootable medium for installing Rust on your computer. Simply boot the ISO and it will integrate the Rust kernel into your GRUB bootloader for easy installation.
